step.description: Happy path: Capture and save screenshot to a valid directory with a custom filename.
Dependent call: Use the output directory from previous step and let the tool use the default filename.
Edge case: Attempt to save screenshot to an invalid or inaccessible path to test error handling.

step.description: Edge case: Save screenshot with an unusually long filename to test filesystem limitations or handling.
